data.name: Manipulated Demo
data.detailed_description:
Manipulated is a logical platformer that will change your consciousness and involve you in the world of puzzles.

Plot (Based on real events)

During the experiment the scientists from the Georgia Tech Research Institute (GTRI) found out that people began to trust robots more than common sense.
Based on this information it was concluded that robots will soon take over mankind and a new era will begin - the Era of Robots.
Manipulated is an analog of a famous experiment where you can test yourself and your abilities to resist a new era.

Puzzles

The game has many puzzles that will test your logical thinking, attention and problem solving. With each level the puzzles will become more challenging and captivating.
The ending of the game will surprise everyone.

Humor

Despite the seriousness of the storyline, the game is filled with irony and humor. This will make your gaming experience more exciting.

Game requirements

- IQ 120 and above;
- Minimum of 2 hands;
- Your favorite computer.

data.short_description: Warning! This game does require an ability to think.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 7800 GT / ATI Radeon HD 3000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.8.5 (Mountain Lion)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 610M / Radeon 8400 / Intel HD 4000 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 7800 GT / ATI Radeon HD 3000 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
